sense.gloss: opening (of a new road, railway, etc.), going into operation (e.g. telephone communication), beginning services
reopening (e.g. of a road to traffic), resumption of services

meanings: counter for letters, notes, documents, etc.

sdata.j: ↑橋↑↓はし↓は|↑開通|↑↓かいつう↓している。
sdata.e: The bridge is open to traffic.

sdata.j: たくさんの↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑新↑↓あたら↓しい↑橋↑↓はし↓の|↑開通|↑↓かいつう↓↑式↑↓しき↓に↑参列↑↓さんれつ↓した。
sdata.e: Quite a few people attended the opening ceremony of the new bridge.

sdata.j: ↑不通↑↓ふつう↓↑区間↑↓くかん↓の|↑開通|↑↓かいつう↓の↑見込↑↓みこ↓みはまだない。
sdata.e: There's no hope at this moment that the closed section will be reopened.
